text: "This is why everyone else thinks I’m blackpilled. I’m not blackpilled. No — everyone else — including the people who matter — especially the people who matter — is on crack." -- Standard blackpill addict discourse. graymirror.substack.com/p/it…

... Whitepill: Look what has been achieved recently even with the enemy in power. X liberated, Roe v Wade gone, fortified electoral apparatus stormed ... also space colonization re-ignited and AGI drops in from the future, btw ... now extrapolate under non-hostile admin. ...

... Given only unrelenting momentum, everything is now doable. Fizziest whitepill: "the people who matter" couldn't more obviously get that. New admin. personnel decisions are all about maximally-accelerated counter-revolutionary surge.

... With the blessings of based (and ever more based) SCOTUS, a century of progressive calamity is going to be rolled-back in under a decade. By then we'll be drenched in synthetic superintelligence and kicking up dust on the Red Planet Frontier.
... Red Horizon. The Evening Redness in the West.

"War is God."
"You mean Mars?"
"Everything draws us to the Red Horizon."
It took an artificial global mega-plague and a domestic coup d'etat to put the breaks on last time, and it only toughened him up.
Reciprocally astounded that woke shit doesn't give you hives.
... It's literally the most grotesque attitudinal complex cosmically possible.
Once it's been corrected to non-existence I'll accept over-correction begins.
